newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - PeopleSoft FY97 raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - PeopleSoft FY97 raised.

text.p: -- EVEREN Securities Inc said Wednesday it raised its estimate for PeopleSoft Inc's fiscal 1997 earnings to $0.71 a share from $0.69 and introducing an estimate for fiscal 1998 earnings of $1.03 a share.
-- EVEREN also raised its intermediate price target to 58 from 55 and the long-term price target to 77 from 71 a share.
-- The moves follow another strong quarter in revenues and earnings for PeopleSoft, which reported earnings of $0.17 a share on revenues of $147.7 million, EVEREN said.
-- PeopleSoft markets applications software for business computer networks.
-- Its shares were trading down 1-1/2 Wednesday at 48-1/4.
